Бокс осводится через: The box will be free in <1>{{time}}</1>
Программа “Экпресс” моет вашу машину дву: The “Express” program washes your car with two shampoos and polishes at the end
Приложите банковскую карту для оплаты: Attach a bank card for payment
Внесите купюры в купюроприемник: Put the bills in the bill acceptor
Терминал сдачу не выдает!: The terminal does not give out change!
Просканируйте QR-код в мобильном приложе: Scan the QR code in the mobile app
Следуйте инструкции в приложении: Follow the instructions in the app
Для оплаты одним из способов необходимо: To pay by one of the methods, you will need to attach a loyalty card
Оплатите мойку баллами с карты: Pay for the car wash with points from the card
Вы получите CashBack от внесенной вами с: You will receive a Cash Back from the amount you deposited
Для списания баллов приложите карту повт: To deduct points, attach the card again
Приложите карту для списания баллов!: Attach a card to deduct points!
Или внесите купюры в купюроприемник: <1>Or</1> put the bills in the bill acceptor
Не рекомендуется мыть автомобили с панор: It is not recommended to wash cars with a panoramic roof!
instrutction_step1: Close the windows. When the indicator lights up – <1>green arrow</1>, slowly enter the box.
instrutction_step2: Before the start of the main washing in the standard and premium programs, at the entrance to the box, water is supplied to the bottom of the machine.
instrutction_step2_2: <1>Drive slowly</1> over the water spray area to wash the bottom of the car and the wheels.
instrutction_step3: When the bottom washing is completed, you can drive further to the center of the box. Place the car in the center of the box, the green arrow will change to a red cross, and the main washing will begin.
instrutction_step4: The consoles that supply water and detergents will go through the required number of cycles around the car, according to the selected program.
instrutction_step5: At the end of the washing, the green arrow will light up. The washing is over, you can leave.
Не перемещайте автомобиль во время мойки: Do not move the car while washing!
Для того чтобы начать следующий цикл мой: In order to start the next washing cycle,
необходимо в обязательном порядке выехат: it is imperative to leave the post!
Можете проезжать в бокс!: You can go to the box!
Бокс освободится через:: The box will be free in:
Оплата с помощью QR-кода для юридических: Payment via QR code for legal entities
Отсканируйте QR-код для оплаты мойки: Scan the QR code to pay for the wash
Вы можете оплатить мойку заранее, пока м: You can pay for the car wash in advance while another car is being washed
There is already one car in the queue. Please wait for the wash to finish.
Очередь заполнена. В очереди уже находит: Queue is full. There is already one car in the queue. Please wait for the wash to finish.
Произошла ошибка при создании заказа: An error occurred while creating the order
Приложение столкнулось с неожиданной оши: The application encountered an unexpected error. Please try refreshing the page.
Поднесите карту к терминалу: Bring the card to the terminal
Wait for the wash to finish...
После окончания мойки наступит Ваша очер: After the wash finishes, it will be your turn, you can drive into the box!
ОПЛАЧИВАЙ МОЙКУ ЧЕРЕЗ ПРИЛОЖЕНИЕ!: PAY FOR WASH THROUGH THE APP!
instruction_new_step1: Choose a wash program and make payment in a way convenient for you
instruction_new_step2: Close windows. Start moving after the digital display shows <highlight>DRIVE INTO THE BOX</highlight>
instruction_new_step3: Before the main wash in Standard and Premium programs, upon entering the box, water is supplied to the car's undercarriage. <highlight>SLOWLY DRIVE</highlight> over the water spray zone to wash the car's undercarriage and wheels
instruction_new_step4: When the undercarriage wash is complete, drive further into the center of the box. Position the car in the center of the box. When the digital display shows "Stop" - finish moving. Turn off the engine
instruction_new_step5: Consoles supplying water and detergents will complete the required number of cycles around the car, according to the selected program
instruction_new_step6: Upon completion of the wash, follow the instructions on the digital display and voice signals, you may exit the box
Для того, чтобы начать следующий цикл мо: In order to start the next wash cycle, you must exit the bay!
